title: Need gift suggestion for my Dadi
selftext:
Hi,   
I recently received my first salary and want to gift something to my grandmother, who is in her late 70s. Need suggestions.   
Currently, the Saregama caravan seems like a good option but I'm not sure.  
 [Saregama Carvaan Mini Shrimad Bhagavad Gita - Music player with Krishna Bhajans](https://www.saregama.com/carvaanmini/shrimadbhagavadgita)   
Also, if any of you have used this can you please give a review?  
Thanks!
comments: what did you get for her? I am planning something similar for my mom
